query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		rankedcveentry {
			affected_products(first:5) {
				edges {
					node {
						cpe_23_uri,
						cve_id,
						id,
						product,
						vendor,
						version,
						version_end_excluding,
						version_end_including,
						version_start_excluding,
						version_start_including,
					},
				},
				nodes {
					cpe_23_uri,
					cve_id,
					id,
					product,
					vendor,
					version,
					version_end_excluding,
					version_end_including,
					version_start_excluding,
					version_start_including,
				},
				total_count,
			},
			affected_products_count,
			cve_age_in_days,
			cve_description,
			cve_id,
			cve_published_date,
			cvss_rating,
			cvss_score,
			cvss_vector,
			cwe_id,
			cwe_name,
			epss,
			id,
			products,
			rank,
			remediation_time_1_month,
			remediation_time_1_quarter,
			remediation_time_1_week,
			remediation_time_1_year,
			remediation_time_1_year_plus,
			remediation_time_24_hours,
			remediation_time_48_hours,
			remediation_time_72_hours,
			remediation_time_pending,
			reports_submitted_count,
			score,
			severity_count_critical,
			severity_count_high,
			severity_count_low,
			severity_count_medium,
			severity_count_none,
			severity_count_unknown,
			submission_count_10_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_11_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_12_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_1_week_ago,
			submission_count_2_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_3_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_4_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_5_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_6_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_7_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_8_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_9_weeks_ago,
			submission_count_trailing_12_to_24_weeks,
			submission_count_trailing_12_weeks,
			submission_end_date_10_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_11_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_12_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_1_week_ago,
			submission_end_date_2_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_3_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_4_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_5_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_6_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_7_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_8_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_9_weeks_ago,
			submission_end_date_trailing_12_to_24_weeks,
			submission_end_date_trailing_12_weeks,
			submission_pct_delta_trailing_12_weeks,
			submission_start_date_10_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_11_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_12_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_1_week_ago,
			submission_start_date_2_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_3_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_4_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_5_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_6_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_7_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_8_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_9_weeks_ago,
			submission_start_date_trailing_12_to_24_weeks,
			submission_start_date_trailing_12_weeks,
			vendors,
		}
	}
